title: "Viral Wall Art"
content:
Welcome to our website, where we showcase a unique collection of abstract wallpapers inspired by computer viruses and malware. Our wallpapers feature repeating patterns of intricate shapes set against a black background, creating a striking visual effect that is both mesmerizing and thought-provoking.

Our collection is perfect for anyone looking to add a touch of edginess to their digital devices or home decor. Whether you're an artist, designer, or just someone who appreciates bold and unconventional art, our wallpapers are sure to make a statement.

All of our wallpapers are carefully crafted using high-quality materials and printing techniques, ensuring that they look stunning on any device or surface. So why settle for boring, generic wallpapers when you can have something truly unique and eye-catching?

Browse our collection today and discover the beauty of abstract art inspired by computer viruses and malware.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a repeating pattern of abstract shapes inspired by computer viruses and malware, set against a black background."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
